title: Logical and for Functions
description: In this lab, we will be exploring the concept of higher-order functions in JavaScript. Specifically, we will focus on creating a function that checks if two given functions return true for a given set of arguments using the logical and operator. Through this lab, you will gain a deeper understanding of how to manipulate functions in JavaScript and how to use them to write more complex and efficient code.

meta.title: Logical and for Functions
meta.description: Explore the power of logical AND with functions in JavaScript and learn to write more efficient code.
meta.keywords: logical and, javascript, javascript practice, javascript practice online, programming tutorial, higher order functions, javascript lab, javascript tutor, code optimization

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
